aka: Metamorphosis' Chantings or That Time When I Incarnated as Porpoise
this_title: Cantos da Metamorfose ou Aquela vez em que eu Encarnei como Boto
trans_title: 化形咏唱或那次我化身为海豚
Metamorphosis' Chantings or That Time When I Incarnated as Porpoise
introduction: Driven by the will to give life, it is inevitable to face the spiral of time. Interior landscapes and authentic conversations to re-establish the flow of metamorphosis: leaping from one being to another as new ways of saying I.
chinese_title: 化形咏唱或那次我化身为海豚
foreign_title: Cantos da Metamorfose ou Aquela vez em que eu Encarnei como Boto
